review: I like the stick but I'm not happy with the lack of apps. I found way too many "free" apps that require a subscription. If I need to pay for content, it should be clearly stated. Hopefully, that will change in the future. When I plugged the stick into my tv, I had a hard time getting a signal. The stick came with a HDMI extender. It worked very well after that.

review: The Fire Stick has fulfilled my expectations.  It provides wireless HD content to my (older) Samsung flat screen and has so far been without hesitation, without motion artifacts, and has produced high quality sound through my equally old Sony stereo tuner and my Bose 301s.
